Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.function

Interface ResultTrait

All Superinterfaces:
Broadcaster, Listener, MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, Repeater, Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter
All Known Subinterfaces:
CheckTrait
public interface ResultTrait extends Repeater
Contains methods to facilitate working with Result monads.

Execution

  • run(Code) - Runs the given code and returns a Result. If the code failed, the result it will contain one or more Messages

Results

  • absent() - Returns a Result that represents a missing value
  • success(Object) - Returns a Result for the given value
  • success(Maybe) - Returns a Result for the given value
  • failure(String, Object...) - Creates a Result with the given failure message
  • failure(Throwable, String, Object...) - Creates a Result with the given failure message
  • failure(Message) - Creates a Result with the given failure message
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:

    • result

      default <T> Result<T> result(T value, Predicate<T> valid, String text, Object... arguments)
      If the given value is valid when tested by the given predicate, a success Result is returned. If the value is not valid, a failure Result is returned with the given formatted message.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to check
      valid - The validity predicate
      text - The failure message
      arguments - Arguments when formatting a failure
      Returns:
      The Result

    • result

      default <T> Result<T> result(T value)
      If the given value is non-null, a success Result is returned. If the value is not valid, a failure Result is returned with the given formatted message.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to check
      Returns:
      The Result

    • result

      default <T> Result<T> result(T value, Predicate<T> valid)
      If the given value is valid when tested by the given predicate, a success Result is returned. If the value is not valid, a failure Result is returned with the given formatted message.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to check
      valid - The validity predicate
      Returns:
      The Result

    • run

      default <T> Result<T> run(com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.code.Code<T> code)
      Returns the result of executing the given Code. Captures any value, or any failure messages broadcast by this object during the call, and returns a Result.
      Parameters:
      code - The code to run
      Returns:
      The Result of the call

      Parameters:

      Returns:
